title: The Pagemaster
creator_credit: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation, Turner Pictures, David Kirschner, Paul Gertz, Joe Johnston and Pixote Hunt
brief_description: Richard is a shy boy but one day when he seeks refuge in a public library during a storm, he is suddenly transported into an incredible animated world filled with adventure and fantasy. In this world, anything is possible. The only limits are set by the imagination. Some of the greatest stories are made part of Richard’s life in the mystical world of “The Pagemaster.” Stars Macaulay Culkin as Richard Tyler, Christopher Lloyd as The Pagemaster, Ed Begley Jnr as Richard’s father and the voices of Whoopi Goldberg, Patrick Stewart, Frank Welker and Leonard Nimoy.
